name: Virtual Warfighter
description:
Virtual Warfighter is a tactical multiplayer shooter for the OpenVR virtual reality platform. Engage in realistic combat with physics-based weapons and handling, which enables tactical maneuvers like throwing grenades around corners or into small spaces.

Currently you can wield eight different weapons complete with seven different attachments for almost endless variety. Each weapon has been carefully designed to reflect operating its real world counterpart. Currently we support three game modes with the option for perma.death for ultimate realism.
